name: Stoneskin
components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)
classes: Druid, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Cleric (War), Druid (Land), Paladin (Ancients), Paladin (Conquest), Paladin (Redemption), Artificer, Artificer, Cleric (Strength (PSA)), Artificer (UA), Artificer (Revisited) (UA), Paladin (Redemption (UA)), Paladin (Conquest v2 (UA))
text:
This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Source: Player's Handbook p. 278
